column2: The name or identifier of the person entering the data.  Name should be written "First Last", like "John Smith"
The name of the school.  No need to include "elementary", "middle", etc.  "Westwood" or "Eastside" is sufficient
The race of the student, as reported on the form.  Write it exactly as they wrote it.  If blank, leave blank.
The last name of the student, as reported on the form.  Include hyphenations if applicable (ie, "Franklin-Garcia").
The first name of the student, as reported on the form.
The student ID number, as found on the roster.  Be especially careful to ensure this field's accuracy.
"y" or "n", referring to whether the student returned a consent form at all. This should always be yes.
"y" or "n", referring to whether the student consented to be immunized.
1 or 2, referring to the number of doses this student is supposed to receive.
0, 1 or 2, referring to the number of vaccines the student received.
The date that the vaccine(s) was/were administered, in format YYYY-mm-dd.  If two doses, this should be two dates, ie 2015-10-01 2015-10-25
"vfc" or "priv" - this student's insurance status, as reported on the form
Put any special comments here. Free-text field.
